Perfil · Former

Igor Hideki Cabianca Yamamoto

Former undergraduate

Amazonense

Superconductivity and modelling.

Participou do ComputEEL/MatSci como aluno de graduação, interessado em materiais quânticos.

Alumni

Igor joined ComputEEL/MatSci as an undergraduate, interested in superconductivity and materials modelling.

His path reflects the group’s diversity, connecting cultural and academic backgrounds to research in quantum materials.

Topics of interest: superconductivity, quantum materials and computational methods.
